alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 4:48PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Morrow County through 515 PM PDT... At 447 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 9 miles southwest of Ione, or 16 miles west of Heppner, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ione and Lexington. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
